description: This file defines the IZigWave interface as part of the WPEFramework's exchange module. It includes virtual methods for managing ZigBee device network operations such as permitting devices, retrieving device info, and managing bindings.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: An interface for ZigWave network management, including device permitting, device info retrieval, device enumeration, and binding operations.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Checks if a device at a specific address can be permitted into the network, returning the current acceptance status.

methods.name: Permutable (overload)
methods.description: Sets the permission status for a device at the specified address.

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a device with the given ID.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all currently available devices.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Creates a binding between source and destination device IDs.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Removes a binding between source and destination device IDs.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
